pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 40     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)4.5 on easy, 7 on normal, 10.5 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Neutral     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Overworld, Nether, End$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Enderman$() can be provoked by looking them in the eyes (Can be prevented if looking through a transparent block or wearing a $(item)Carved Pumpkin$()). They can teleport and pick up blocks. Take damage from water.
